headline: How WTW’s Climate Insurance Launch in the Philippines May Shape Its Long-Term Investment Story
summary: The Government of the Philippines, alongside global conservation organization Rare and Willis, a WTW business, has recently launched the nation's first parametric insurance solution for 14,200 small-scale fishers, providing up to US$100 per policy cycle to mitigate income loss from adverse weather conditions. This pioneering initiative not only secures fisher livelihoods but also links insurance access to sustainable fishing practices and formal registration, integrating climate resilience...
